page.title: 17A GROOM'S DAY,EDGEWORTH.
page.content: {07.00am.}Get up to muck out and feed the horses.Put in new bedding of straw {08.30am.}Breakfast for the grooms. {09.00am.}"Tack up" horses, leave stables for exercise of road work with lots of trotting. {11.15am.}Return horses to stables,take off and clean tack. {1.00pm.}"Skip out" all stables. Put rugs on horses and feed them. {1.30pm.}Dinner for grooms. {2.00pm.}Finish cleaning tack. {3.00pm.}Thorough groom of each horse. {4.00pm.}Exercise the horses. {5.30pm.}Wash and dry the horses. {6.30pm.}Rug, water and feed horses. {7.00pm.}Tea. {7.30pm.}Groom horses. {9.00pm.}Final feed of the day. {10.30pm.}Put rugs, muzzles on horses to stop them eating their beds.
